```{r, echo=FALSE, results="asis"}
cat("
<script>
setInterval(function() {
    var myImageElement = document.getElementById('image');
    var imageUrl = myImageElement.src.split('?')[0]; // Remove cache-busting query param if it exists
    myImageElement.src = imageUrl + '?rand=' + Math.random(); // Append a random number as a query param to force the browser to bypass the cache
}, 1000); // Refresh every 10 seconds
</script>
")
```
